channel.title: NetNewsWire Betas
channel.description: Most recent NetNewsWire changes with links to updates.

item.title: NetNewsWire 5.1.1
item.description:
Fixed a crash handling a specific type of weird URL

Preferences: restored ability to set default RSS reader

Fixed bug where o key wouldn’t mark older as read

Fixed an Open System Preferences button in an alert that didn’t work

Fixed a possible hang when adding a feed to Feedly (and the feed isn’t found)

Fixed some UI issues to do with adding a Feedly account

Fixed contrast in footnotes indicator

Fixed bug where duplicate accounts (same username and service) could be made

Fixed bug where open in Safari in background might not open in the background

item.title: NetNewsWire 5.1
item.description: This is the release version of NetNewsWire 5.1.

item.title: NetNewsWire 5.1b2
item.description:
Important note! If you created an account using a previous 5.1 test build, you will have to create it again.

This is because we turned off sandboxing in this build, and sandboxing changes the location of your data.

(We turned off sandboxing due to crashes we didn’t feel we could investigate and fix in time. We’ve postponed that feature to a later version.)

Changes since 5.1b1:

The Clean Up command now works in the All Unread smart feed

Sandboxing has been reverted to off
